Author: Michael Stapelberg
Comment:
Beware: i3status.conf is _not_ an example config file which should be comprehensive. Instead, it should contain a reasonable default config with which many people should be fine.

Therefore, please remove the tztime pacific from i3status.conf and keep it only in the manpage.

Author: Michael Stapelberg
Comment: Thanks for adding this. I think it would be good to add an example, so that it’s clear how that information is useful: “Files below that path make for valid timezone strings, e.g. for "/usr/share/zoneinfo/Europe/Berlin" you can use "Europe/Berlin" in tztime.”

Author: Michael Stapelberg
Comment: It looks like your indentation is wrong here.
